body: Interviu Online:1.  Please describe (in as much detail as possible) the most complex/interesting bug that you have found while playing a game.2.  This is a full-time position. Standard working hours are from 9:00 in the morning until 18:00 in the afternoon. We also have an evening shift that starts at 18:30 and finishes at 2:00 in the night. What shift are you willing and able to work ?
title: Game Tester
